What We Do

Design

We provide end-to-end user experience design services, and structure our projects to be collaborative, intense, and sensitive to constraints.

  • UX Strategy
  • UX Design
  • Information Architecture
  • Visual Design
  • Prototyping
  • Content
  • Research
  • HTML & CSS

Discovery

EightShapes aligns your team around a shared product vision through design principles, customer insights, prototyped concepts.

Learn More

Systems

EightShapes guides your investment in design systems as living products so teams can make innovative, beautiful experiences together.

Learn More

Who We Are

We’re tenacious about solving business, customers and design challenges. We prioritize a friendly, collaborative environment. And we believe that successful projects depend on transparency, cooperation and Post-Its.

How We've Contributed

EightShapes’ contributions to the UX design work include three books, a documentation templating system and a prototyping framework, not to mention countless workshops, webinars and articles.

Behind The Wheel

My kids aren’t yet old enough to learn to drive. But I picture myself in the passenger seat, years from now, and imagine what it feels like to teach them. I’m sure it’s terrifying, but that’s not what I mean.
